languages.text: "И мне пришлось самой отвратить тебя от чудовищной ереси, Вольный Торговец! Иначе бы..." {n}Арджента перехватывает оружие с выразительным выражением лица, ее пылающие глаза устремлены прямо на вас.{/n}

"Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И мне пришлось самой отвратить тебя от чудовищной ереси, Вольный Торговец! Иначе бы..." {n}Арджента перехватывает оружие с выразительным выражением лица, ее пылающие глаза устремлены прямо на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

"Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

"Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

"Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

"Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est bien pour ça que j'ai dû agir de mon propre chef afin de vous protéger de cette innommable hérésie, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Autrement... » {n}Argenta resserre son poing sur la poignée de son arme tout en gardant ses yeux ardents braqués sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien pour ça que j'ai dû agir de mon propre chef afin de vous protéger de cette innommable hérésie, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Autrement... » {n}Argenta resserre son poing sur la poignée de son arme tout en gardant ses yeux ardents braqués sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: "Und darum musste ich eigenmächtig handeln, um Euch vor unaussprechlicher Ketzerei zu bewahren, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Hätte ich das nicht getan ..." {n}Argenta umschließt demonstrativ mit der Hand den Griff ihrer Waffe, ihren brennenden Blick auf dich gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und darum musste ich eigenmächtig handeln, um Euch vor unaussprechlicher Ketzerei zu bewahren, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Hätte ich das nicht getan ..." {n}Argenta umschließt demonstrativ mit der Hand den Griff ihrer Waffe, ihren brennenden Blick auf dich gerichtet.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Y por eso he tenido que actuar por cuenta propia para protegerle de una herejía inefable, Comerciante Independiente! De lo contrario...». {n}Argenta ajusta enfáticamente la mano con la que empuña su arma y no aparta de ti su mirada ardiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Y por eso he tenido que actuar por cuenta propia para protegerle de una herejía inefable, Comerciante Independiente! De lo contrario...». {n}Argenta ajusta enfáticamente la mano con la que empuña su arma y no aparta de ti su mirada ardiente.{/n}

languages.text: 「だから我が自ら動き、御身を筆舌に尽くしがたい異端から守らねばならなかったのだ、自由開拓者！そうしていなければ…」{n}アルジェンタは当て付けがましく武器を握り直し、燃えるような視線を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だから我が自ら動き、御身を筆舌に尽くしがたい異端から守らねばならなかったのだ、自由開拓者！そうしていなければ…」{n}アルジェンタは当て付けがましく武器を握り直し、燃えるような視線を向ける。{/n}

languages.text: “所以我才必须采取行动，以免不可言说的异端邪说对你造成任何伤害，行商浪人！要不是我……”{n}阿洁塔有意正了正武器，炽热的目光死死地盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “所以我才必须采取行动，以免不可言说的异端邪说对你造成任何伤害，行商浪人！要不是我……”{n}阿洁塔有意正了正武器，炽热的目光死死地盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: "Bu yüzden seni tarifsiz bir kâfirlikten korumak adına kendi bildiğimi okumak zorunda kaldım Hür Tacir! Eğer böyle yapmasaydım..." {n}Yakıcı bakışlarını sana diken Argenta, dikkatle silahını daha sıkı kavrıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Which is why I had to act of my own accord to shield you from unspeakable heresy, Rogue Trader! If I hadn't..." {n}Argenta pointedly adjusts her grip on her weapon, her burning gaze trained on you.{/n}
